briefTitle: Role of Positron Emission Mammography (PEM) Flex Solo II Positron Emission Tomography (PET) Scanner in Evaluating Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy Response in Patients With Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Role of PEM Flex Solo II PET Scanner in Evaluating Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy Response in Patients With Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Women 18-75 years old with newly diagnosed breast cancer who are considered candidates for breast conserving surgery (i.e., lumpectomy)

Exclusion Criteria:

* Children (\< 18 years old)
* Pregnant or Lactating women
* Diabetic patients (Type I or II)
* Patients who are scheduled for a sentinel node procedure using radioactive Tc-99m within 24 hours of PEM
* Patients who have NOT undergone a standard of care bilateral breast MRI
